The '''dragon's breath''' is a [[brewing]] item that is used solely to make [[lingering potion]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Harvesting ===
Dragon's breath can be obtained by {{control|using}} empty [[glass bottle]]s on the [[ender dragon]]'s breath attack while perched, or on the purple [[area effect cloud|effect clouds]] caused by [[dragon fireball]]s.

== Usage ==
=== Brewing ingredient ===
Dragon's breath may be added to any splash potion to upgrade it to a lingering potion, which can be used to create a lasting [[area effect cloud]], or to craft [[tipped arrow]]s.
{{brewing
|name=[[Lingering Potion]]
|showname=1
|Dragon's Breath
|Matching Lingering Potion
|base=Matching Splash Potion
|ingredients=[[Dragon's Breath]] + <br>Any [[Splash Potion]]
}}

With two or more dragon's breath in the brewing stand, after the brewing process, a glass bottle drops as an [[Item (entity)|entity]]. However, with one dragon's breath in the brewing stand, the glass bottle is consumed and cannot be retrieved.<ref>{{bug|MC-259583}}</ref>
